weAreOnlineClothing: We are an online clothing store that operates throughout Ukraine. Here you will find stylish clothes at affordable prices.
goalShopping: To make shopping simple, enjoyable and profitable ❤️ We believe that fashion should be accessible to everyone.
workFromMNtoFR: From Monday to Friday from 10:00 to 18:00
processedOrders: Orders are processed within 1 business day. Delivery takes 1-3 days depending on the region.
returnPolicy: If the product doesn't fit, don't worry! We have an easy return policy. Just keep the product in good condition and contact us via Direct within 14 days.
questionOrSuggestion: Do you have a question or suggestion? Write to us on Direct or use the feedback form on the website.
